014package org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect.internal;
015
016import java.beans.IntrospectionException;
017import java.beans.Introspector;
018import java.beans.PropertyDescriptor;
019import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
020import java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle;
021import java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles;
022import java.lang.invoke.MethodType;
023import java.lang.reflect.Method;
024import java.lang.reflect.Parameter;
025import java.lang.reflect.Type;
026import java.util.Arrays;
027import java.util.Map;
028import java.util.Objects;
029import java.util.Optional;
030import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
031import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap;
032import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
033import java.util.function.Function;
034import java.util.function.Supplier;
035import java.util.stream.Collectors;
036import java.util.stream.Stream;
037
038import io.leangen.geantyref.GenericTypeReflector;
039import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.ConfigRegistry;
040import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.JdbiCache;
041import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.JdbiCaches;
042import org.jdbi.v3.core.generic.GenericTypes;
043import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.exceptions.Sneaky;
044import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.exceptions.Unchecked;
045import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect.internal.BeanPropertiesFactory.BeanPojoProperties.PropertiesHolder;
046import org.jdbi.v3.core.qualifier.QualifiedType;
047import org.jdbi.v3.core.qualifier.Qualifiers;
048import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.UnableToCreateStatementException;
049
050public class BeanPropertiesFactory {
051    private static final JdbiCache<Type, PropertiesHolder<?>> PROPERTY_CACHE =
052            JdbiCaches.declare(PropertiesHolder::new);
053
054    private BeanPropertiesFactory() {}
055
056    public static PojoProperties<?> propertiesFor(Type t, ConfigRegistry config) {
057        return new BeanPojoProperties<>(t, config);
058    }
059
060    private static boolean shouldSeeProperty(PropertyDescriptor pd) {
061        final Method read = pd.getReadMethod();
062        if (read == null) {
063            return pd.getWriteMethod() != null;
064        }
065        // 'class' isn't really a property
066        return read.getParameterCount() == 0
067                && read.getDeclaringClass() != Object.class;
068    }
069
070    static class BeanPojoProperties<T> extends PojoProperties<T> {
071        private final ConfigRegistry config;
072
073        BeanPojoProperties(Type type, ConfigRegistry config) {
074            super(type);
075            this.config = config;
076        }
077
078        @SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "rawtypes" })
079        @Override
080        public Map<String, BeanPojoProperty<T>> getProperties() {
081            return (Map) PROPERTY_CACHE.get(getType(), config).properties;
082        }
083
084        @Override
085        public PojoBuilder<T> create() {
086            final PropertiesHolder<?> holder = PROPERTY_CACHE.get(getType(), config);
087            final T instance = (T) holder.constructor.get();
088            return new PojoBuilder<T>() {
089                @Override
090                public void set(String property, Object value) {
091                    holder.properties.get(property)
092                        .setter()
093                        .accept(instance, value);
094                }
095
096                @Override
097                public T build() {
098                    return instance;
099                }
100            };
101        }
102
103        static class BeanPojoProperty<T> implements PojoProperty<T> {
104            final PropertyDescriptor descriptor;
105            final QualifiedType<?> qualifiedType;
106            final ConcurrentMap<Class<?>, Optional<Annotation>> annoCache = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
107            final Function<Object, Object> getter;
108            final BiConsumer<Object, Object> setter;
109            final Type actualBeanType;
110
111            BeanPojoProperty(PropertyDescriptor property, Type actualBeanType) {
112                this.descriptor = property;
113                this.actualBeanType = actualBeanType;
114                this.qualifiedType = determineQualifiedType();
115                getter = Optional.ofNullable(descriptor.getReadMethod())
116                        .map(Unchecked.function(MethodHandles.lookup()::unreflect))
117                        .map(mh -> mh.asType(MethodType.methodType(Object.class, Object.class)))
118                        .map(mh -> Unchecked.function(mh::invokeExact))
119                        .orElse(null);
120                setter = Optional.ofNullable(descriptor.getWriteMethod())
121                        .map(Unchecked.function(MethodHandles.lookup()::unreflect))
122                        .map(mh -> mh.asType(MethodType.methodType(void.class, Object.class, Object.class)))
123                        .map(mh -> Unchecked.biConsumer(mh::invokeExact))
124                        .orElse(null);
125            }
126
127            protected Function<Object, Object> getter() {
128                if (getter == null) {
129                    throw new UnableToCreateStatementException(String.format(
130                            "No getter method found for bean property [%s] on [%s]",
131                            getName(), qualifiedType));
132                }
133                return getter;
134            }
135
136            protected BiConsumer<Object, Object> setter() {
137                if (setter == null) {
138                    throw new UnableToCreateStatementException(String.format(
139                            "No setter method found for bean property [%s] on [%s]",
140                            getName(), qualifiedType));
141                }
142                return setter;
143            }
144
145            @Override
146            public String getName() {
147                return descriptor.getName();
148            }
149
150            @Override
151            public QualifiedType<?> getQualifiedType() {
152                return qualifiedType;
153            }
154
155            private QualifiedType<?> determineQualifiedType() {
156                Parameter setterParam = Optional.ofNullable(descriptor.getWriteMethod())
157                    .map(m -> m.getParameterCount() > 0 ? m.getParameters()[0] : null)
158                    .orElse(null);
159
160                return QualifiedType.of(
161                        GenericTypeReflector.reduceBounded(GenericTypeReflector.annotate(
162                            GenericTypeReflector.resolveExactType(
163                                Optional.ofNullable(descriptor.getReadMethod())
164                                    .map(m -> GenericTypeReflector.getExactReturnType(m, actualBeanType))
165                                    .orElseGet(() -> GenericTypeReflector.getExactParameterTypes(descriptor.getWriteMethod(), actualBeanType)[0]),
166                            actualBeanType)))
167                        .getType())
168                    .withAnnotations(
169                        new Qualifiers().findFor(descriptor.getReadMethod(), descriptor.getWriteMethod(), setterParam));
170            }
171
172            @Override
173            public <A extends Annotation> Optional<A> getAnnotation(Class<A> anno) {
174                return annoCache.computeIfAbsent(anno, x ->
175                    Stream.of(descriptor.getReadMethod(), descriptor.getWriteMethod())
176                        .filter(Objects::nonNull)
177                        .map(m -> m.getAnnotation(anno))
178                        .filter(Objects::nonNull)
179                        .findFirst()
180                        .map(Annotation.class::cast))
181                    .map(anno::cast);
182            }
183
184            @Override
185            public Object get(T pojo) {
186                return getter().apply(pojo);
187            }
188        }
189
190        static class PropertiesHolder<T> {
191            final Supplier<T> constructor;
192            final Map<String, BeanPojoProperty<?>> properties;
193            PropertiesHolder(Type type) {
194                final Class<?> clazz = GenericTypes.getErasedType(type);
195                try {
196                    properties = Arrays.stream(Introspector.getBeanInfo(clazz).getPropertyDescriptors())
197                            .filter(BeanPropertiesFactory::shouldSeeProperty)
198                            .map(p -> new BeanPojoProperty<>(p, addMissingWildcards(type)))
199                            .collect(Collectors.toMap(PojoProperty::getName, Function.identity()));
200                } catch (IntrospectionException e) {
201                    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Failed to inspect bean " + clazz, e);
202                }
203                Supplier<T> myConstructor;
204                try {
205                    MethodHandle ctorMh = MethodHandles.lookup()
206                            .findConstructor(clazz, MethodType.methodType(void.class))
207                            .asType(MethodType.methodType(Object.class));
208                    myConstructor = Unchecked.supplier(() -> (T) ctorMh.invokeExact());
209                } catch (ReflectiveOperationException e) {
210                    myConstructor = () -> {
211                        throw Sneaky.throwAnyway(e);
212                    };
213                }
214                constructor = myConstructor;
215            }
216
217            private Type addMissingWildcards(Type type) {
218                if (GenericTypeReflector.isMissingTypeParameters(type)) {
219                    return GenericTypeReflector.addWildcardParameters(
220                            GenericTypeReflector.erase(type));
221                }
222                return type;
223            }
224        }
225    }
226}
